attributes.action: Ofcom should distribute specrum fairly amoung mobile phone networks. Especially the Three network who did not receive the free 900MHz frequency.
attributes.additional_details: o2 and Vodafone were given 900MHz frequency for free by Ofcom. Three entered the market in 2003 and had spent billions on a 3G licence amoung all the other operators. This year Vodafone and o2 were allowed to transmit 3G services over 900MHz. This is unfair to all the other operators and needs addressing!
